name: As Intended
description: A fun race where all effect cards are enabled and can be obtained during play.

name: Classic Race
description: No effect cards, no breaks, just pure speed and knowledge!

name: Drinking Version
description: All effect cards are enabled, but you start with none. Owner can hand out during pause, for drinking of course.

name: Speedy
description: A fast-paced race with a very short timer. Can you keep up and think on your feet?

name: Strategic
description: A slow paced, turn-based race. Might lead to some interesting results?

name: Bombs Away!
description: Race with a twist: A few bombs each! Use them wisely!

name: Swaptastic
description: Plenty of swaps for everyone! Can you keep up?

name: Ultimate Chaos
description: All effect cards enabled, short timers, full chaos.

name: Blitzkreig
description: A blitz game with both bombs and a super short timer. Only for the bold!

name: Find Kevin Bacon
description: Classic race, but your goal is to reach the Wikipedia page for Kevin Bacon.

name: Find Hitler
description: Classic race, but your goal is to reach the Wikipedia page for Adolf Hitler.

name: Find Jesus
description: Classic race, but your goal is to reach the Wikipedia page for Jesus.
